title: Which laptop to run league?
body:
Hey all, I'm getting a new laptop and was wondering which was the best for running the game. Not looking for anything crazy just the normal 50-60fps. I have a choice between two laptops and I'lll leave the specs down below:

1. Lenovo Laptop Windows 10

AMD A-12 Series
AMD Radeon R7
8 GB Ram
2.7 GHz
SATA Hard Drive

2. Lenovo Laptop Windows 10

AMD A6-7310 accelerated processor (Quad-Core)
AMD Radeon R4
4 GB Ram
2.0 GHz
SATA Hard Drive

The only part throwing me off from getting the first one is the quad-core accelerated processor in the second one. I don't know much about how the graphics cards work with AMD therefore I seek advice from the community.

replies.body: We can't make that decision for you, but I can offer our[ recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide.  This should help find options best fit for you!  Good luck!
